entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning late this evening then changing to snow near midnight and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
